title: Is zoology also called as Life sciences? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yess basically some science subject which complete form the life patterns these all are comes under the facility of life sciences such as zoology botany biochemistry biosciences microbiology ecology environmental sciences aquaculture.
Not only Zoology but Botany Biotechnology Microbiology Biochem. etc. are covered under Life Sciences. In short, Life sciences is a group under which zoology is covered.
